alert.note: Alert for Coastal Gulf; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf County through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 358 PM EDT/258 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wewahitchka, or 15 miles north of Port St. Joe. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wewahitchka, Overstreet, Honeyville and White City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
